Nov. 29, 1970 D Northumberland Brass Band League (Section A)
Northumberland Brass Band League (Section A) 0 Test Piece Contest

Pegswood, Northumberland Hymn tune contest - 1st Pegswood, 2nd Ashington. March contest held in conjunction with Section B - 1st Ashington Colliery, 2nd Pegswood, 3rd Wallsend Shipyard. 2 bands competed.
March 27, 2013, 10:30 a.m. March 27, 2013, 10:39 a.m.
1 Wansbeck's Ashington Colliery Band J. J. Stobbs
2 Pegswood Colliery Prize Band James Farrell
